entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023
